name: Người Lạ (Strangers) Part 1
description:
Người Lạ Part 1 is a cinematic 3D visual novel that follows the story of professional speedrunner Tien. 

Tien and her brother Duc have recently moved to Ho Chi Minh City.  While Tien is preparing for a major tournament, an obsessive fan begins to creep into her life. 

~8 minutes long

A game by Christine Fouron, Emi Schaufeld, Lu Yang, Toby Do, and Varun Saxena.

Made at NYU for Game Studio 2 Spring 2020.

You can check out our other classmates' games here.

Special thanks to Robert Yang, Steph Clark, Maria Mishurenko, and all of our amazing classmates. 

P.S. If this game makes enough money to buy us a bottle of tequila we will MAYBE make part 2 lol
